r.receive_reporter_email, r.send_reporter_email, r.report_no, a.answer_no, a.board_no, a.answer_contents, u.nickname, r.report_reason, TO_CHAR(r.report_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') report_date, u.condition FROM REPORT r, ANSWER a, USERS u, BOARD b WHERE r.receive_reporter_email = u.email AND a.answer_no = r.answer_no AND b.board_no = a.answer_no
r.receive_reporter_email, r.send_reporter_email, r.report_no, c.comment_no, c.comment_contents, c.board_no, u.nickname, r.report_reason, TO_CHAR(r.report_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') report_date, u.condition FROM COMMENT_INFO c, REPORT r, USERS u, BOARD b WHERE r.receive_reporter_email = u.email AND c.comment_no = r.comment_no AND b.board_no = c.board_no
AND r.receive_reporter_email LIKE '%'||#{search.searchKeyword}||'%'

ORDER BY r.report_no
) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum}) outer_table WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
